content: *includes video tutorial this super cute crochet flower pillow is the perfect addition to your room this 8-petaled flower worked in the round makes for a beautiful motif for a crochet pillow the simple color scheme allows you to customize it with any color you like made with medium weight yarn and a 4mm hook gauge 9 rounds = 10cm/4in dimensions 22cm/8 66in diameter pillow materials * 3 different yarn colors for flower center flower petals and pillow base * crochet hook * scissors * yarn needle * fiber fill
